Key.English: Only one dynamic weather module can be used

Initial weather setting. Arid - A region that receives very little precipitation. Continental - Climate is marked by variable weather patterns and a large seasonal temperature variance. Tropical - Climate zone where winter rainfall is associated with large storms and most summer rainfall occurs during thunderstorms. Mediterranean - The climate is characterized by hot, dry summers and cool, wet winters. Real Weather - Real weather for a time and location you specifiy.
Change variance to weather between weather cycles
Time in seconds between each weather cycle
